agentContext.summary: A Next.js app deployed with jack. Supports SSR, SSG, and React Server Components.
agentContext.full_text:
## Project Structure

- `app/` - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
- `public/` - Static assets
- `open-next.config.ts` - OpenNext configuration
- `wrangler.jsonc` - Worker configuration

## Commands

- `bun run dev` - Local development
- `jack ship` - Deploy to production
- `bun run preview` - Preview production build locally

## Conventions

- Uses App Router (not Pages Router)
- SSR and SSG work out of the box
- Server Components supported

## Resources

- [OpenNext Docs](https://opennext.js.org/cloudflare)
- [Next.js App Router](https://nextjs.org/docs/app)
